description: Warm up on a chilly morning with this banana bread baked oats recipe. This delicious breakfast is easy to make and features all the familiar flavours of banana bread.
name: Banana Bread Baked Oats Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 0.25 cup maple syrup (plus extra to serve)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200C/180Â°C fan-forced. Spray a 25cm (5cm deep) round baking dish with oil.
Place all the ingredients, except sliced banana, walnuts and yoghurt, in a large bowl. Stir to combine.
Transfer mixture to dish. Top with sliced banana and scatter over walnuts.
Bake for 35 minutes or until golden. Cool for 5 minutes. Serve warm with yoghurt and a drizzle of extra maple syrup.
